meanings.definition: The quality or state of being right-handed or left-handed.
meanings.sent1: Her handedness was evident when she effortlessly wrote with her left hand.
meanings.sent2: His handedness became clear when he picked up the pen with his right hand.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved guessing people's handedness just by looking at them.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, handedness can determine a player's advantage on the field.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun game to help the students remember their handedness.

meanings.definition: The dominant hand or side of a person.
meanings.sent1: She used her handedness to expertly paint a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent2: His handedness was evident as he skillfully caught the ball with his right hand.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret to success was his exceptional handedness in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The artist's masterpiece showcased his unique handedness in brush strokes.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's graceful movements highlighted her fluid handedness on stage.
